author: Charles E. Wilson
text: Our expanding Canadian operations are concrete evidence of General Motors confidence in Canada.

author: Armstrong Williams
text: Sports nurtures dreams of achieving self confidence and masculine striving for the skinny kid watching a boxer dance around the ring with sublime ease.

author: Christie Laing
text: The thing that attracted me to acting the most was I always felt quite unsure or insecure as a kid, and for some reason, when I got to perform these lines and characters, I felt safe. There was this confidence and excitement from performing that I loved.

author: Henry Rollins
text: To me, getting muscular was the first thing I ever achieved by working at it, and it was a game changer for me, because it was the first time I ever had confidence.

author: Sarah McLachlan
text: I was a pretty insecure kid, didn't have a lot of friends, and was picked on a lot, and music gave me confidence.

author: Krysten Ritter
text: I'm currently single, so I want to have fun! As for what guys need to do to date out of their league, it's all about the swagger. If you have confidence, you can get pretty much any girl.

author: Tom Landry
text: Leadership is a matter of having people look at you and gain confidence, seeing how you react. If you're in control, they're in control.

author: Richard P. Feynman
text: If you keep proving stuff that others have done, getting confidence, increasing the complexities of your solutions - for the fun of it - then one day you'll turn around and discover that nobody actually did that one!

author: Steve Prefontaine
text: Kids made fun of me because I was a slow learner, because I was hyperactive, because of a lot of things. Running gave me confidence.

author: Ricki-Lee Coulter
text: I was born with confidence in myself and who I am. Even when I was a little kid, I felt that, and I carried it all through my years. I'm 26 now, and I'm still that person. I think every woman needs to have that self-love.

author: Ioan Gruffudd
text: There's a physicality and confidence to Americans; they're very present. That's something I enjoy being around because it rubs off on you.

author: Joan Didion
text: You think you have some stable talent that will show no matter what you're writing, and if it doesn't seem to be getting across to the audience once, you can't imagine that moment when it suddenly will. Gradually, gradually you gain that confidence.

author: Philip Schultz
text: If I get the idea, and I get some clarity on how I feel about that idea, then I can safely assume I'll find the right words. I do have that confidence.

author: Todd Tiahrt
text: The Republican Party will never again be a majority party until we regain the confidence of the American people. I believe there is room for disagreement within the party, and we should not have litmus tests.

author: Tamara Mellon
text: I'm always impressed by confidence, kindness and a sense of humour.

author: Ian Doescher
text: I always wanted Han Solo's confidence and swagger. My personality is way more C-3PO, but Han was always who I wanted to be.

author: Steve Easterbrook
text: The progress we have made in a short amount of time gives me confidence we're making the right moves to turn around our business and reposition McDonald's as a modern, progressive burger company.

author: Leon Bridges
text: Dance really built my confidence on stage. I'm still a shy person. But I have a lot more confidence than I did when I started.

author: Teemu Selanne
text: We've played with a lot of confidence and that's been the key so far. Hopefully, we can take more confidence into the playoffs.

author: Evander Holyfield
text: A sight game is that I am hurt, but I aim to make you believe I am not even hurt, and with this confidence appearing on my face, I don't panic, otherwise your opponent will know that you are hurt. That's the whole art game in boxing.

author: Vince Lombardi
text: Confidence is contagious. So is lack of confidence.

author: Arthur Erickson
text: The Achilles Heel of the Americas was the lack of cultural confidence typical of new settlers.

author: Gareth Gates
text: I do find my speech difficult at times, but it's getting so much better as my confidence grows and that's thanks to the position I'm now in, which is totally due to my fans.

author: Blake Lively
text: The most beautiful thing you can wear is confidence.

author: Giraldus Cambrensis
text: Nature hath given not only to the highest, but also to the inferior, classes of the people of this nation, a boldness and confidence in speaking and answering, even in the presence of their princes and chieftains.
